name: Yum-alert
tagline: Email alert for your yum updates !
body:
# Presentation

Yum-Alert is a simple bash script to monitor your yum updates, and send you an email if news packages are available !

Works (and tested) with CentOS Linux...


------------------------------
# Email example

**Subject :**

Server : MyGreatServer --> News packages available ! 

**Content :**

Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, presto
Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
 * base: mirror.ovh.net
 * epel: mirror.affix.me
 * extras: mirror.ovh.net
 * updates: mirror.ovh.net

glibc.x86_64                          2.12-1.80.el6_3.5                  updates

glibc-common.x86_64                   2.12-1.80.el6_3.5                  updates

kernel.x86_64                         2.6.32-279.5.2.el6                 updates

kernel-firmware.noarch                2.6.32-279.5.2.el6                 updates

openssl.x86_64                        1.0.0-25.el6_3.1                   updates



------------------------------
# Installation and configuration

The script must be executable, that's all :)

Put this script in _/etc/cron.weekly/_ or _/etc/cron.daily/_


------------------------------
# Version tracking

v1.0: first public release
